attributes.action: Implement Fair Pay Structures in the British Isles for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister would be the highest paid, as the leader of our democracy.
No other person/persons, immaterial of position, should receive an amount more than this as his/her salary/or by any other means in worth, as an annual payment 
Anyone working a 35-hour week will receive not less than 10% of this amount as an annual payment
Those that work less than 35 hours, to be paid pro-rata.
The latter two represent the most in need, the former the least in need.
This structure should allow enough leeway for a sliding scale for pay increase for position etc.  
This should stop the unacceptable difference between the over paid, and the under paid, which is widespread in the British Isles at present.
